tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Dr. Zhong is a really good chemistry teacher. She taught the concepts really but you still have to self study if you want that A. Her redemption system helps so don\'t get discouraged if you do bad on the first midterm. Try and and have upward trend in grades. I got a C on the first midterm but showed improvement later on and got an A in the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Prof. Zhong is an exceptionally nice person. Fellow classmates described her as a mom teaching you Chemistry. Lectures are dry power points, but she did make an effort to make the class interactive with some group work. She is very straightforward with what you need to know for exams (study guides) and is most helpful at office hours.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: CARING  INSPIRATIONAL  GET READY TO READ
comments: She\'s so nice!!! And patient. Go to her office hours, it\'s really helpful. Love her!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: The class isn\'t too bad, she was very nice and tried to make the material more interesting. There was also a nice curve for the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She talks really fast in lecture, so if you can keep up, great. KNOW HOW TO DO THE HOMEWORK!!! And if you study the past midterms, you can easily get an A in the class. If you go to lecture, pay close attention to her slides. She\'s not difficult, she\'s just hard to follow sometimes...

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Could not stay awake in her class but the curve is very generous for gen chem. Learning the material independently isn\'t easy but possible.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: lectures and office hours are helpful. really tough quizzes and midterms however. but made the final exam much easier. had a C- going into the final, but aced the final like a boss and ended up with B+ in the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Very easy grading. You must put effort into the class to get the grade you want. Her lectures are hard to follow but going to her office hours are so helpful. She doesn\'t trick you or give you anything you\'ve never seen before in her lectures. Overall she\'s the best chemistry teach I have had.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Went into the final with a C- and came out of the class with a solid B. BEAST!!!!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Very enjoyable class. If you do the readings, the online homework, the practice tests, and so forth, then you will succeed in that class. The tests are straightforward. There are no tricks. If you can\'t answer it then you haven\'t understood the homework or practice tests. This is why you should go to office hours to clarify what you don\'t know.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Judging from the previous comments, I think it\'s safe to say that her teaching has improved SIGNIFICANTLY. There is no way you can fail this class if you attend lectures, study notes, do recommended problems, practice tests and go to office hours when needed. She is also incredibly nice.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Teaches very well (though her accent may throw you off sometimes). Tests were very straightforward, no tricks so long as you understand the material. She\'s very helpful and nice, and is open to suggestions. Curves are so-so if you really need them. If you put the effort into it, this class should be cake.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: where do i even begin with this teacher? Overall i ended up with a b in her class. She has a curve but not as good as other teachers. An A- is 85% while other teachers set their curve at 80. Her PRACTICE midterms are a joke... FIRST its another teachers midterm. SECOND the practice midterms had nothing to do with the actual midterm. She is also ver

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She is a good teacher, however everything she teaches doesn\'t appear on exams. It is also very difficult to understand her. I would have preferred a different professor =/

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She puts out a lot of tricky questions on her midterms and final. But because they are so tricky, there is a huge curve. Shes definitely not the best at teaching and needs help learning how to teach. Her accent is bad and needs getting use to. Surprisingly, though, her English (sentence structures, etc), is not that bad.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She can\'t teach her way out of a paper bag, but she is not a mean person. I feel bad for her, because nobody listens to her and everyone treats her like **** .... yes her Chinese accent is irritating, but her class wasn\'t hard. I got an A+ by doing her recommended problems on the syllabus... her averages are LOWWW so the curve is good for you.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Horrible professor. I learned more in 3 hours from reading the textbook than i did in 3 weeks going to her lectures. Do not take this professor if you have to choice.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Avoid! She\'s probably the hardest chem prof. If you do have her though just read the book and do problems in the book. If you don\'t understand the concept make sure you ask TA. If you do that, you\'ll do fine. I just read the book did problems in the book and got an A. Not THAT hard but hard considering the other chem profs were easier

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: This quarter,both Zhong and Schoeller are horrible.All self-learning.Very low attendance,I found it useless to go to lecture because you don\'t learn anything.Writes too fast, not enough time to copy down everything(and writing is horrible)Test are hard and NOT the same as the practice ones.Had a good T.A though.Choose Schoeller for the easier tests

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: class is hard.tests are not correlated to practice midterms, lecture, or homework. class has curve but it is not that helpful. midterm averages were 50%. if possible, avoid professor.
